text: Adolfo Gutierrez Quiñones or Adolfo Gordon Quiñones (May 11, 1955 – December 30, 2020), known professionally as Shabba Doo, was an American actor, dancer, and choreographer. He was born in Chicago, Illinois.Herguth, Bob (1987) "Shabba-Doo", Chicago Sun-Times, July 31, 1987 Quiñones played Orlando "Ozone" in the 1984 breakdancing movie Breakin' and its sequel, Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo. Quiñones died of a short-illness at his Los Angeles home on December 30, 2020 at the age of 65.'Breakin' star Shabba Doo dies at 65 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American choreographers Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Shabba Doo
